data.title: Soaring® Tree Top Zip Line Adventures
data.meta_description: Ready for a family fun adventure? Ride a historic steam engine train through the mountains and canyons near Durango and Silverton in Southwestern Colorado year-round.
data.meta_site_name: Official Durango & Silverton Narrow Gauge Railroad Train
data.text:
Ride the historic Durango & Silverton Narrow Gauge Railroad to Soaring® Tree Top Adventures, an extreme zip line adventure that is the only one of its kind in the continental United States and is fun for all ages. This amazing zip line attraction is remotely located on 180 private acres surrounded by the San Juan Mountains of Durango, Colorado, and is accessible only by the Durango & Silverton Railroad. Soaring® Tree Top Adventures is an all-day adventure for the whole family.

Soaring is booking their adventures for the summer 2023 season. Visit the Soaring website here.

First-Class Travel! Soaring® guests travel in their own private First-class train cars between Durango and Tall Timber station.

After your arrival on the historic Durango & Silverton Narrow Gauge Railroad, you will be greeted by Sky Rangers who are extensively trained for your safety and will accompany you throughout the day. You will also meet the Eco Rangers, who educate guests throughout the day on Soaring’s commitment to sustainability and preservation of the rare old-growth Ponderosa forest where Soaring resides.

Lunch! A visit to Soaring® is not complete without treating your appetite as well. Included in your full-day experience is a delicious four-course gourmet lunch served on a suspended platform that overlooks the Animas River. Several delicious lunch options are prepared on site by skilled chefs, including a vegetarian option and a children’s menu. The kitchen staff is also adept at handling special dietary restrictions and food allergies with advance notice.

Longest & Safest Course of Its Kind. Soar over the San Juan Mountains on 27 different zip lines that range from 56 to 1,400 feet in length. Over a mile and a half of cable will carry you across the Animas River and through majestic Old Growth Ponderosa Pines and beautiful Aspen Groves.

Package includes the 5½ hour zipline adventure, all required equipment, expert Sky Ranger guides, Eco Tour specialists, a four-course gourmet lunch served in the trees and first class round-trip train excursion.

Schedule:

May 24 through October 15: Depart Durango on 8:15am train (or board train in Rockwood at 9:25am.)

Arrive back in Durango at 5:30pm (Rockwood arrival 4:20pm).

Note: Minimum weight is 50 lbs; maximum weight is 265 lbs. We recommend wearing long pants and dressing in layers appropriate for mountain weather. Close-toed and close-backed shoes are required (no flip-flops or sandals).

CLICK HERE for more information and a video on Soaring® Tree Top Adventures!

Advance reservations required. Availability is limited.

Relax at the end of the day while waiting for the train to come through and take you back to Durango.

New friends are made every day.
